bill_title: revise certain provisions on how real property sales are used to assess real property and to lower the general fund levies of school districts.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to revise certain provisions on how real property sales are used to assess real property and to lower the general fund levies of school districts. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That § 10-6-74 be amended to read as follows: 10-6-74. Any real property which sells for more than one hundred fifty seventy-five percent of its assessed value, may not be used for the purpose of valuing other real property. The sale of any real property which is not used for the purpose of valuing other real property pursuant to this section may not be used in any sales ratio study. Section 2. For taxes payable in 2007, the levy for the general fund of a school district, as provided in § 10-12-42, shall be lowered by: (1) Twenty-four cents per thousand dollars of taxable valuation subject to the limitations on agricultural property as provided in subdivision (2) of this section, owner-occupied property as provided for in subdivision (3) of this section, and nonagricultural acreage property as provided for in subdivision (4) of this section; (2) Five cents per thousand dollars of taxable valuation for agricultural property; (3) Eleven cents per thousand dollars of taxable valuation for an owner-occupied single-family dwelling as defined in § 10-13-40; and (4) Five cents per thousand dollars of taxable valuation for nonagricultural acreage property. This rate reduction is in addition to any other adjustment made by the Eighty-first Legislature of the State of South Dakota to the levy for the general fund of a school district as provided in § 10-12-42. Section 3. That § 10-6-74 be amended to read as follows: 10-6-74. Any real property which sells for more than one hundred fifty two hundred percent of its assessed value, may not be used for the purpose of valuing other real property. The sale of any real property which is not used for the purpose of valuing other real property pursuant to this section may not be used in any sales ratio study. Section 4. That § 10-6-74 be repealed. 10-6-74. Any real property which sells for more than one hundred fifty percent of its assessed value, may not be used for the purpose of valuing other real property. The sale of any real property which is not used for the purpose of valuing other real property pursuant to this section may not be used in any sales ratio study. Section 5. Section 3 of this Act is effective on July 1, 2007. Section 6. Section 4 of this Act is effective on July 1, 2009.
